articles.author: Jordan Moreau
articles.title: 'Weapons' Crosses $100 Million at the Box Office Domestically - Variety
articles.description: 'Weapons' has passed $100 million at the box office in North America.
articles.content:
It may not have happened at 2:17 a.m., but “Weapons” has reached a major box office milestone.
Director and writer Zach Cregger‘s horror hit, about 17 school children from the same class who mysteri… [+2291 chars]

articles.author: Alice Park
articles.title: The Clashing Advice Over COVID-19 Shots for Kids - AOL.com
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics is breaking from federal advice about COVID-19 shots for kids—a highly unusual move.
articles.content: Should you give your baby a COVID-19 shot? The answer isn't as straightforward or as much of a consensus as it used to be: In an unusual move, the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) is recommending… [+6271 chars]
